entry.title: WIND WARNING , Victoria (University of)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:49 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 10.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: University of Victoria 09:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Temperature: 10.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Dewpoint: 7.0°C
Wind: WSW 20 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 near Haro Strait this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 near noon. Temperature steady near 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:44 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait this evening. Wind becoming light near midnight then becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low 6. Forecast issued 08:44 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 10.
